name: Space Webscape
description:
You find yourself being a spider on an abandoned space station. Your only goal is to survive and escape it.

Use your spider abilities to navigate this space station and escape.

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Space to jump
  • Aim and hold right mouse button to shoot webs
  • Use H while on a web to eat it
  • Press R while on a web anchor to reset certain levels
